summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 CHEVROLET AVEO.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE KEY WAS STUCK IN THE IGNITION AND THE GEAR WAS UNABLE TO BE SHIFTED OUT OF PARK.  THE KEY WILL NOT MOVE FROM THE LOCKING POSITION.  IN ORDER TO TURN OFF THE VEHICLE, THE CONTACT MUST DISCONNECT THE BATTERY.  THE BATTERY MUST THEN BE RECONNECTED TO RESTART THE VEHICLE.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE REPAIR WOULD COST $300.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 38,857.
